Text:
I appreciate your effort to upload this, however it is basically useless seeing you have encoded the video with the "VP70" codec. Not even VLC is capable of decoding it and i cannot convert to another format because of this.
Next time please use a common format like .avi or .mkv

Is there no way I can play these files?
There has to be some way I can play them

Please help
If your not running linux with an Ogg player, don't even bother downloading this. The file format is strictly Linux or BSD, there is nothing for Windows that will play this.
